mapper.select: SELECT s.`ds_name`,sds.`db_code`,s.`ds_type`,sd.`table_id`,sd.`field_id`,sd.`sort` FROM sys_dataset s LEFT JOIN sys_datasource sds ON s.`db_source_id`=sds.`id` LEFT JOIN sys_dataset_detail sd ON s.`ds_id`=sd.`id`
SELECT s.`ds_name` as label,s.id , s.ds_id FROM sys_dataset s

SELECT t1.id, t1.ds_id as dsId, t1.ds_name as dsName, t1.ds_type, t1.db_source_id, t1.create_date, t2.field_name, t2.ds_id, t2.table_id, t2.table_name, t2.field_id, t2.field_en_name, t2.field_ch_en_name, t2.sort, t3.db_code, t3.db_name FROM sys_dataset t1 JOIN sys_dataset_detail t2 ON t1.id = t2.ds_id JOIN sys_datasource t3 ON t1.db_source_id = t3.db_code WHERE t1.id = #{id}
